6.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came out and saw that the people were praying during (the night of) Ramadan in the corner of the mosque. He asked: Who are these people ? It was said to him that those were people who had not learnt Quran. But Ubayy b. Ka'b is praying and they would pray behind him. The Prophet (ﷺ) said: They did right and it is good what they did. Abu Dawud said: This tradition is not strong, the narrator Muslim b. Khalid is weak

chapter.eng-name: Regarding Standing (In Voluntary Night Prayer) During The Month Of Ramadan
